title: 3 Simple Ways to Sign Out of Your Apple ID

steps.title: Open iTunes.
steps.content: Open iTunes. Click or double-click the iTunes app icon, which resembles a multicolored musical note on a white background.

steps.title: Click Account.
steps.content: Click Account . It's at the top of the iTunes window. A drop-down menu will appear.

steps.title: Click Sign Out.
steps.content: Click Sign Out . This option is in the middle of the Account drop-down menu. Doing so immediately logs you out of your iTunes account.

steps.title: Click the Apple menu and select System Settings.
steps.content: Click the Apple menu and select System Settings . You'll find the Apple menu at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Click your name.
steps.content: Click your name. It's at the top of the left sidebar.

steps.title: Click Sign Out.
steps.content: Click Sign Out . You'll now be walked through the simple steps of downloading the data stored in iCloud. Follow the on-screen instructions to finish signing out of your Apple ID. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open your iPhone's Settings.
steps.content: Open your iPhone's Settings. Tap the Settings app icon, which resembles a grey box with a set of gears on it.

steps.title: Tap your Apple ID card.
steps.content: Tap your Apple ID card. It's the box with your name at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Sign Out.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Sign Out . You'll find this at the very bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Turn off Find My iPhone if prompted.
steps.content: Turn off Find My iPhone if prompted. If Find My iPhone is enabled, you'll need to enter your Apple ID password and tap Turn Off at the bottom of the prompt.

steps.title: Copy any data you want to save.
steps.content: Copy any data you want to save. Tap the white switch to the right of any categories of data you want to save before logging out of your Apple ID account. For example, to save a copy of your Apple ID account's contacts, you would tap the white switch to the right of the "Contacts" heading.

steps.title: Tap Sign Out.
steps.content: Tap Sign Out . It's in the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Sign Out when prompted.
steps.content: Tap Sign Out when prompted. Doing so immediately signs you out of your Apple ID account.
